title: First Taste
description: An Ellora's Cave Naughty Nooners story.It's Natalie's ten-year high school reunion and she's reluctantly joined the planning committee. Things start to look up, though, when she finds that Haley Moore is on the committee, and she's even more gorgeous than Natalie remembered. Ten years before, Natalie and Haley had experimented sexually together, but when high school ended, they went their separate ways. Their unexpected reunion finds them ready to make up for lost time, both in bed and out.
author: Paisley Smith
